name: fso22-phonebook-backend
description: Backend for the Full Stack Open 2022 phonebook exercise

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../fullstackopen-2022/part02/phonebook && npm run build && cp -r build ../../../fso22-phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: tnikFi
